body_text:
If I understand, this is copying the options and filtering them by options with null values. Is that right?
If so, I don't think the copying is necessary, because we never modify them, we only read them or iterate over them.
RE: the null checking, when would we receive options with null values?
body:
If I understand, this is copying the options and filtering them by options with null values. Is that right?

If so, I don't think the copying is necessary, because we never modify them, we only read them or iterate over them.

RE: the null checking, when would we receive options with null values?

If so, I don't think the copying is necessary, because we never modify them, we only read them or iterate over them.
